About me

I'm Piero Rospigliosi, a cloud platforms consultant with more than 10 years of experience designing, automating, and scaling infrastructures for companies across different sectors and sizes. I've led complex multi-cloud environments on AWS, GCP, and Azure, with a focus on Kubernetes, IaC, observability, and security.

My approach combines technical excellence with strategic vision: I don't just implement, but I guide technical and product teams to make sustainable, efficient architectural decisions aligned with their business objectives.
